Class FluentTable

                      com.threerings.gwt.ui.FluentTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasClickHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasWidgets, SourcesTableEvents, Iterable<Widget>
public class FluentTable
extends FlexTable

Extends FlexTable and provides a fluent interface for adjusting the styles of cells.

Nested Class Summary

          Used to format cells.
